segments.text: I notice the water is just pouring over the edge of the sink, creating a big puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman doesn't even seem to notice, she's just drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how unaware she is of the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so mischievous, taking those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really going to hurt himself if he's not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is already tipping, and he's not even paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her cookie, completely oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone needs to do something before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice and tidy, unlike this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long this chaos has been going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is going to be in for a surprise when she turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The light from the window is highlighting the mess, making it even more obvious.
segments.speaker: PAR
